## SchemasService class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SchemasService
```

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                                               | Modifiers           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [getAssociatedComponentTemplateLinks({ escapedSchemaId, })](./open-api-client.schemasservice.getassociatedcomponenttemplatelinks.md) | <code>static</code> | Gets a list of all Component Template links that can render Components based on the specified Schema. This operation returns an instance of 'Link' type.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getSchemaInstanceData({ escapedSchemaId, })](./open-api-client.schemasservice.getschemainstancedata.md)                             | <code>static</code> | Gets instance data of a specified Schema including default field values. This operation returns an instance of 'SchemaInstance' type.                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [synchronizeWithSchema({ requestModel, flags, })](./open-api-client.schemasservice.synchronizewithschema.md)                         | <code>static</code> | <p>Synchronizes the content and metadata of a given model with its Schema. The operation returns the synchronized model and the synchronization actions that were applied. This operation returns an instance of 'SynchronizationResult' type.</p><p>Using this operation will not persist the changes made through synchronization.</p> |
